bug.author: yufengg
bug.summary: docs: Broken link/missing py file in Model Files guide
bug.description:
On the page <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/how_tos/tool_developers/>"A Tool Developer's Guide to TensorFlow Model Files"</denchmark-link>
(<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/how_tos/tool_developers/index.md>GitHub md link</denchmark-link> ) In the GraphDef section, there's a link to , pointing to the url <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/tools/graph_metrics.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/tools/graph_metrics.py</denchmark-link>
This url does not exist. Perhaps it's intended to point at a different file in that folder? I don't see an obvious suitable replacement from scanning the filenames listed: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/python/tools>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/python/tools</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/petewarden>@petewarden</denchmark-link> This one of your doc files?
graph_metrics.py was removed, so we should update the docs.
